name: The Hippity-Hop Shop
description:
Welcome to the Hippity-Hop shop! In a world of frogs, you sell... Frogs! So beware of the health inspector that wants to shut your shop!

All art by me exept the frog (default from scratch).

Background music by VOiD1Gaming(www.void1gaming.com) License: POP Music Pack License.pdf

Sfx default by scratch.

Sorry for low quality screenshots (and game...).
